/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with trees and lampposts, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. Cars are parked neatly along the sides of the road, hinting at the rhythm of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is slightly blurred, adding a sense of motion and dynamism to the otherwise static cityscape.
